overview:
Nii Laryea also known as SAMUEL LARYEA is a social media enthusiast and an inbound marketing expert. He doubles as the founder of infinity book club and co - founder for icon publicity international.

He is the local and area youth president for Christ Apostolic Church Int. managing a total of eight youth ministries. His passion for the work of God can not be over emphasized as he pioneered the establishment of an annual youth celebration dubbed “ACHIEVERS’ NIGHT” which is meant to celebrate young men and women who have distinguished themselves in their various field of endeavors, in its second year the celebrations have featured the Hon. deputy minister for information,Samuel okudjeo Ablakwa and Fifi Folson, Ghana and Africa’s best radio gospel show host.

Nii laryea is a trained mechanical engineer from Accra Polytechnic and currently works with Integrated Data Systems as a sales engineer because of his love sales and marketing

Nii Laryea believes that sales and marketing is an art and a skill that is inherent in the individual which has to be discovered, nurtured and grown, just like an artist, a footballer and a musician. Marketers are born and not made.
